basics.name: Chester Leoso
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Manage and operate a team of 10 students, representing 3 other campuses. Conducting research, financial palnnig, and market adoption

 Provide level I and II technical services for clients. Generate reports and records for ticket associated issues using Cherwell application. Troubleshoot hardware, software and networking issues for entire UH system. Support and monitor 10,000+- servers and network AP applications for UH ecosystem. Support over 10 campuses, 20,000 students and 10,000 employees within University of Hawaii system
highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

work.summary:  SharePoint developer for SBIR/STTR System Management team, Developed Flows that were able to automate tickets within SBIR/STTR Planners, Reviewed Java client-side applications for ProSAMS database, Developed ProSAMs and EHB tracker for enhancements and bugs, Implemented automation for work flows with forms connected SBIR Help Desk teams
